DOC.brief_title: Study Autologous Stem Cell Transplantation Patients With Ischemic Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : The purpose study evaluate safety feasibility intra-arterial intravenous injection autologous bone marrow mononuclear cell patient acute sub-acute phase ( > 3 < 90 day symptom onset ) ischemic cerebral infarct middle cerebral artery territory . Methods : 15 patient cerebral infarct within middle cerebral artery territory enrol prospective , nonrandomized , open-labeled study . Up 10 patient receive 500x 10 6 autologous bone marrow cell inject intra-arterially middle cerebral artery percutaneous approach . The procedure monitor Transcranial Doppler ( TCD ) electroencephalogram ( EEG ) . Other 5 patient receive 500x 10 6 autologous bone marrow cell inject intravenously . Changes neurological deficit improvement function evaluate baseline regular interval follow-up ( 4 month ) . EEG neuroimaging exam perform baseline regular interval follow-up period .
